XmlSpatialContextSerializer Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This static class provides the ability to serialize and deserialize spatial contexts to and from GML.


Static Public Member Functions

static System::Void XmlDeserialize (NAMESPACE_FDO_CONNECTIONS::IConnection *connection, NAMESPACE_FDO_XML::XmlSpatialContextReader *reader, NAMESPACE_FDO_XML::XmlSpatialContextFlags *flags)
static System::Void XmlDeserialize (NAMESPACE_FDO_CONNECTIONS::IConnection *connection, NAMESPACE_FDO_XML::XmlSpatialContextReader *reader)
 reads all Spatial Contexts from an XML document to an FDO connection.
static System::Void XmlSerialize (NAMESPACE_FDO_CONNECTIONS::IConnection *connection, NAMESPACE_FDO_XML::XmlSpatialContextWriter *writer, NAMESPACE_FDO_XML::XmlSpatialContextFlags *flags)
static System::Void XmlSerialize (NAMESPACE_FDO_CONNECTIONS::IConnection *connection, NAMESPACE_FDO_XML::XmlSpatialContextWriter *writer)
 writes all Spatial Contexts from the FDO connection to an XML document.
